name: Akema's Home
description:
Akema's Home

Restore the stars and save Akema's home in this short, light-hearted 2D shooter.

This is a simple game created for a tutorial series on getting started with Unity for absolute beginners.

Goal

Get through the wave of enemies to restore the stars!

Controls

WASD or arrow key movement and SPACE to fire

Credits

Art

  • 2D Space Game Concept by Utopic Games
  • 2D Monsters And Characters by Utopic Games

Music/SFX

Chase Bethea

Programming

Justin Horner
